root: ^And it appears things will remain that way for quite some time.
^I was hoping to find someone to take the reigns and own the Diner. So I could work on my own at the United Dimensions, and feel secure that the Diner is good hands.
^I have not found someone suitable enough for the position.
^There are some that say showing care and kindness to the patrons is more important than the food itself.
^(O'Ryan then turns, and slowly marches out of the Diner.)
